str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
Becomingly, decorously, decently. Adverb from euschemon; decorously.
From tasso; regular arrangement, i.e. fixed succession, official dignity.
